title: Google\Cloud\Dialogflow\V2\Environment
name: Environment
description:
You can create multiple versions of your agent and publish them to separate environments.

When you edit an agent, you are editing the draft agent. At any point, you can save the draft agent as an agent version, which is an immutable snapshot of your agent. When you save the draft agent, it is published to the default environment. When you create agent versions, you can publish them to custom environments. You can create a variety of custom environments for:

  • testing
  • development
  • production
  • etc. For more information, see the versions and environments guide.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.dialogflow.v2.Environment

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.name
params.description: Output only. The unique identifier of this agent environment. Supported formats: - projects/<Project ID>/agent/environments/<Environment ID> - projects/<Project ID>/locations/<Location ID>/agent/environments/<Environment ID> The environment ID for the default environment is -.

params.name: data.description
params.description: Optional. The developer-provided description for this environment. The maximum length is 500 characters. If exceeded, the request is rejected.

params.name: data.agent_version
params.description: Optional. The agent version loaded into this environment. Supported formats: - projects/<Project ID>/agent/versions/<Version ID> - projects/<Project ID>/locations/<Location ID>/agent/versions/<Version ID>

params.name: data.state
params.description: Output only. The state of this environment. This field is read-only, i.e., it cannot be set by create and update methods.

params.name: data.update_time
params.description: Output only. The last update time of this environment. This field is read-only, i.e., it cannot be set by create and update methods.

params.name: data.text_to_speech_settings
params.description: Optional. Text to speech settings for this environment.

params.name: data.fulfillment
params.description: Optional. The fulfillment settings to use for this environment.
